title: Love Always Disappoints - Sometimes: A Destiny Disrupted
description: Exploring the complexities of A journey of hope and resilience.Trevor Jones lives alone in a crummy downtown apartment, works as a night janitor, and enjoys the safety of aspiring to nothing.Unfortunately, it’s not a life he can maintain after crossing paths with Joy Gonzalez, his opposite in almost every way that matters.Can they overcome the peril they represent to each other, and experience the impossible – a shared destiny?Love Always Disappoints – Sometimes, delves deep into the psyche of friendship and love, hope and resiliency. But not all wounds are healable and not all decisions are chosen.
author: Renard M. Alotta
